author: Fearless & Far
description:
Want to do your own 4x4 Trip of Mongolia? Check out https://themongoliatour.com/

To celebrate 3 million subscribers and 1 BILLION views, we headed deep into the heart of Mongolia for an unforgettable ice fishing adventure on frozen Ugii Lake.

We drilled through thick ice, camped overnight right on the lake, and shared laughs, food, and vodka with some incredible Mongolian locals. This trip had everything—freezing temps, wild catches, and the kind of human connection that reminds you why we travel in the first place.

🎣 Fish, fire, frozen beauty.
⛺ Arctic camping like you've never seen.
🥂 A wild lakeside party with local nomads.

Thanks for being part of this journey. Here's to many more.

Join our Expeditions & Adventure Retreats
www.fearlessandfar.com/trips

My packing list + Adventure Filmmaking Gear is here:

title: Vodka & Ice Fishing with Mongolian Madmen! (3M Subs)
